jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain web applications, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and contribute to all phases of the development lifecycle.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development
Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and at least one modern JavaScript framework (e.g., React, Angular, Vue)

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Analyze and interpret complex data sets, create reports and visualizations, and support data-driven decision-making processes.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field
2+ years of experience in data analysis
Proficiency in SQL, Excel, and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: Manage and oversee project lifecycle, coordinate with stakeholders, and ensure project delivery within scope, time, and budget.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
5+ years of experience in project management

jobs.title: Marketing Specialist
jobs.description: Develop and implement marketing strategies, manage social media accounts, and create marketing content.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field

jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.description: Create visual concepts and designs for digital and print media, collaborate with clients and team members, and deliver high-quality graphic solutions.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or related field
3+ years of experience in graphic design
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)
